title: Anatomy Formatting Schema
description: Defines formatting rules for anatomy descriptions including part order, pluralization, and descriptor formatting

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema for editor support.

id.description: Unique identifier for this formatting configuration

descriptionOrder.description: Order in which body part types appear in descriptions

pairedParts.description: Body part types that are paired (like eyes, arms, etc.) and should be grouped when they have the same descriptors

irregularPlurals.description: Mapping of body part types to their irregular plural forms

descriptorOrder.description: Order in which descriptor component types appear in descriptions

descriptorValueKeys.description: Keys to search for when extracting descriptor values from components

equipmentIntegration.description: Configuration for integrating equipment descriptions with anatomy

prefix.description: Text to prepend to equipment list

suffix.description: Text to append to equipment list

separator.description: Separator between multiple items of the same type

placement.description: Where to place equipment description relative to anatomy

descriptorFormatRules.description: Custom formatting rules for specific descriptor types. Keys are descriptor component IDs (e.g., 'descriptors:embellishment')

additionalProperties.description: Formatting rule for a specific descriptor type

prefix.description: Text to prepend before the descriptor value

suffix.description: Text to append after the descriptor value

transform.description: Value transformation to apply before prefix/suffix
